mapper.insert: insert into t_activity_item (act_id, stu_id , audit) VALUES (#{activity.id}, #{student.id}, #{audit});
mapper.select: select id, audit from t_activity_item where act_id=#{activityId} and stu_id=#{studentId};

select act_type.id, act_type.name, sum(act.duration) totalDuration from t_activity_item act_item inner join t_activities act on act_item.act_id=act.id inner join t_activity_type act_type on act_type.id=act.activity_type where act_item.stu_id=#{studentId} and act_item.audit=1 group by act.activity_type;
select act_item.id item_id, act_item.audit, act.id act_id FROM t_activity_item act_item inner join t_activities act on act_item.act_id=act.id where act_item.stu_id=#{id};
